event.event-label: Linux-defined event: OOM killer killed process
event.descr:
The Linux kernel has killed a process because the system is out of memory
Killed process name: %parm[killedProcName]%
Killed process PID: %parm[killedProcID]%
Message: %parm[oomMessage]%
Killed process total VM: %parm[killedProcTotalVM]%
Killed process anon RSS: %parm[killedProcAnonRSS]%
Killed process file RSS: %parm[killedProcFileRSS]%
Host: %nodelabel%
Interface: %interface%
Message: %parm[syslogmessage]%
Process: %parm[process]%
PID: %parm[processid]%
